text: Ya 'Ayyuha Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Liyasta'dhinkumu Al-Ladhina Malakat 'Aymanukum Wa Al-Ladhina Lam Yablughu Al-Huluma Minkum Thalatha Marratin Min Qabli Salaati Al-Fajri Wa Hina Tađa`una Thiya Bakum Mina Az-Zahirati Wa Min Ba`di Salaati Al-`Isha'i Thalathu `Awratin Lakum Laysa `Alaykum Wa La `Alayhim Junahun Ba`dahunna Tawwafuna `Alaykum Ba`đukum `Ala Ba`đin Kadhalika Yubayyinu Allahu Lakumu Al-'Aya Ti Wa Allahu `Alimun Hakimun
